name: Humayun Tariq Mughal
bio: I am a full stack software engineer with a strong foundation in front-end and back-end development. My passion for solving complex problems, effective logic building skills and solution driven mindset helps me in developing robust, scalable and user-friendly applications. My undergraduate degree in Business Administration with a major in marketing and past experience as a branding strategist helped me in developing creative and interpersonal skills which I aim to use in my software engineering career. I am particularly exploring opportunities in web and mobile app development as well as using artificial intelligence to create intelligent and transformative applications.
